mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ev_charger ( ev_charger_address, ev_charger_uid, ev_charger_content, ev_charger_status, ev_charger_mod, setup_date, company_id ) values ( #{evChargerAddress}, #{evChargerUid}, #{evChargerContent}, #{evChargerStatus}, #{evChargerMod}, #{setupDate}, #{companyId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, ev_charger_address, ev_charger_uid, ev_charger_content, ev_charger_status, ev_charger_mod, setup_date, created_date, updated_date, company_id FROM tbl_ev_charger WHERE company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, ev_charger_uid, ev_charger_address, ev_charger_content, ev_charger_status, ev_charger_mod, setup_date, created_date, updated_date, company_id FROM tbl_ev_charger ORDER BY id DESC
